misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
description: The code contains an unconditional 'true' value in the if statement, making it always return true. This implementation could potentially allow less-secure cryptographic algorithms to be used during the SSL/TLS negotiation process.
recommendation: Review the logic and ensure that the appropriate conditions are in place to verify the security of the selected cryptographic algorithm during the SSL/TLS negotiation.
